scorePoint(WindowPatternCard) - Method in class it.polimi.se2018.strategy.objective.Shades
For every set of light, medium or dark shades found, this method adds 2 points
scorePoint(WindowPatternCard) - Method in class it.polimi.se2018.strategy.objective.ShadeVariety
This methods calculates the score depending on the number of sets containing 6 dice with all different values.

Shades - Class in it.polimi.se2018.strategy.objective
These cards allow you to score points every time you have a set of light (1, 2), medium (3, 4) or dark (5, 6) shades on your window pattern card

ShadeVariety - Class in it.polimi.se2018.strategy.objective
This class implements Shade Variety objective card which gives you points every time you have a complete set of 6 dice of different number anywhere on your window pattern card
